headline: Schwab Asset Management Announces Zero Capital Gains Distributions for Schwab ETFs for 2024
summary: WESTLAKE, Texas, December 20, 2024--Schwab Asset Management®, the asset management arm of The Charles Schwab Corporation, today announced there will be no capital gains distributions for the 2024 tax year by any of the 32 exchange-traded funds (ETFs) in the Schwab ETF family.

raw.headline: Schwab Asset Management Announces Zero Capital Gains Distributions for Schwab ETFs for 2024
